main event: A truck driver reported seeing a bright white light in the sky while driving near Copemish, Michigan on July 8, 1961. The object was stationary for approximately 10 minutes before moving rapidly to the Southeast and disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as about the size of a small airplane, solid white in color, and emitting a bright white light., The witness noted that the object appeared to hover before moving rapidly., The witness, E.H. Davis, was a 45-year-old male who seemed to be a reliable source., The observation took place under clear, starry night conditions., No other witnesses were reported, suggesting a solitary sighting.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
witness description: E.H. Davis, male, age 45, truck driver
